app.name: Namaz Vakti API
app.one_liner: Provides free, unlimited Islamic prayer times via a RESTful API based on geographic location or place ID.

core_loop: User requests prayer times by GPS coordinates, nearby places, or place search; the system calculates and returns accurate namaz vakitleri using the irem library and adhan-js algorithm.

screens.name: Prayer Times Dashboard
screens.purpose: Display current and upcoming prayer times for a selected location.

rust_commands.name: fetch_prayer_times_gps
rust_commands.purpose: Retrieve prayer times based on latitude, longitude, timezone offset, and language.
